form.title: Get a quote
form.descriptionReason: We want to serve you in the best possible way.
form.descriptionCTA: Complete the following form, select the services you want to quote, and we will contact you as quickly as possible.

formAboutYourProject.title: Tell us about the project
formAboutYourProject.technologyPrompt: In which technologies are you interested?
formAboutYourProject.overviewPrompt: Could you provide a brief overview of your project for us?
formAboutYourProject.other: Please specify the technology you need
formAboutYourProject.otherService: Please specify the service you need

validationFormProject.techRequired: At least one technology must be selected
validationFormProject.serviceRequired: At least one service must be selected

formBudget.title: Budget Information
formBudget.teamTypePrompt: Select the type of team you are looking for
formBudget.investmentPrompt: What is your desired investment amount?
formBudget.staff: What is your monthly budget per resource?
formBudget.budget: What is the bugdet for your project?

investmentAmount.4: I do not have an assigned budget yet

validationFormQuotes.teamTypeRequired: Please select the type of team you are looking for

successMessage.title: Thank you!
